text: Huw Cadwaladr was a 17th-century Welsh poet. Little is known about him. His works include an elegy on the death of Edward Morris, and a carol on the death of Rowland Vaughan of Caer-Gai. == References == Category:17th-century Welsh people Category:Welsh male poets Category:17th-century Welsh poets Category:17th-century male writers
title: Huw Cadwaladr
